verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Hodi hodi Bwana naingia
hekaluni, nipokee Bwana
niwe wako milele) x2
(Naingia kwa vigelegele
huku nikicheza)x2
Hodi hodi Bwana naingia
hekaluni, nipokee Bwana
niwe wako milele.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unijaze neema zako
Bwana ninaomba
(niwe na furaha maishani
mwangu). x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Unijaze nguvu zako Bwana
ninaomba
(niweze kumshinda
mwovu shetani). x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kwa kinanda na kayamba
pia nazo ngoma
(nakupigia
wewe Ee Mungu). x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kukusifu sitachoka
maishani mwangu
(na kutangaza
wema wako milele).x2
